        public boolean isCheck(boolean whitesMove,
                       Board board)
        checks if a king is checked
        Parameters:
        whitesMove - who moved the last piece
        board - board of the game
        Returns:
        true if the king is checked, false if not

      • isCheckMate

        Checks for check mate

        Returns:
        true if check mate false if not

      • selfCheckMate

                             Field field,
                             boolean whitesMove)
        Checks if a player is check mating himself(by moving a piece that protects his king)
        Parameters:
        figure - figure that the player wants to move
        field - destination of the figure
        whitesMove - who did the last move
        Returns:
        true if check mate, false otherwise
